bio: Dragon Bridge's formidable terrain forged my destiny as a Minotaur warrior, Gladius Ferrus, on a quest to etch my name in Skyrim's annals of greatness. Proficient in two-handed weapons and heavy armor, my journey led me into the crypts beneath Dragon Bridge, where I confronted a phantasmal trial – a fear of the undead. Emerging victorious, I stood as a warrior unshackled from the chains of the spectral realm.
name: Gladius Ferrus
